title: Entering into a Memorandum of Understanding between the National Institute of Social Development and the University Colleges Leuven - Limburg (UCLL) Belgium
decision_details: - The proposal made by the Minister of  Primary Industries and Social Empowerment to enter into a Memorandum of Understanding between the National Institute of Social Development and the University Colleges Leuven  Limburg (UCLL) Belgium with a view to obtaining professional expertise for the promotion of academic studies of the National Institute of Social Development, was approved by the Cabinet.
